Class UserView

util.Observable

Class that represents the Textual User Interface

      public UserView()

  • Method Details

    • askNumOfPlayer

      public int askNumOfPlayer() throws IOException

      Method used to ask the first player number of players it wants to play with.
      If the input from the player is invalid a NumberFormatException gets caught. This method also notifies the observers with a Message if everything worked.

      Returns:
      an int that represents the max number of players for a match, in case of error -1
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if a IOException gets caught
      IOException

    • askPlayerNickname

      public String askPlayerNickname() throws IOException

      Method used to ask the player its nickname.
      This method notifies the observers if everything worked.

      Returns:
      a String that represents the nickname
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if a IOException gets caught
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player chooses an inappropriate parameter
      IOException

    • userInterface

      public int userInterface()

      Method used to ask a player which type of interface he prefers.
      If the player chose a wrong parameter a NumberFormatException or a IllegalArgumentException will be catch. This method also notifies the observers with a Message if everything worked.

      Returns:
      an int that represents the choice of the player, in case of error -1
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if a IOException gets caught

    • showTUIBoard

      public void showTUIBoard(@NotNull @NotNull model.Board board)

      Method that shows the player the Board.

      Parameters:
      board - the Board of a match

    • showTUIBookshelf

      public void showTUIBookshelf(@NotNull @NotNull model.Bookshelf bookshelf)

      Method that shows the player the Bookshelf.

      Parameters:
      bookshelf - a specific Bookshelf

    • askColumn

      public int askColumn()

      Method that asks the player the column in which it wants to put the tiles.
      If the player chose a wrong parameter a IllegalArgumentException will be catch. This method also notifies the observers with a Message if everything worked.

      Returns:
      an int that represents the index of the chosen column, in case of error -1
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if a IOException gets caught

    • askTilePosition

      public String askTilePosition() throws IOException

      Method that makes the player choose the tile on the board.
      This method also notifies the observers with a Message if everything worked.

      Returns:
      a String of coordinates formed like this: (1,3)
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if a IOException gets caught
      IOException

    • askNumberOfChosenTiles

      public int askNumberOfChosenTiles()

      Method that asks the player how many tiles it wants to pick from the board.
      If the player chose a wrong parameter a IllegalArgumentException will be catch. This method also notifies the observers with a Message if everything worked.

      Returns:
      an int that represents the number of tiles that the player wants to pick up from the board, in case of error -1
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if a IOException gets caught

    • printTilesInHand

      public void printTilesInHand(@NotNull @NotNull ArrayList<model.Tile> tilesInHand)

      Method that prints the tiles that a player picked.

      Parameters:
      tilesInHand - an ArrayList of Tiles that represents the tiles a player has picked from the board

    • askTileToInsert

      public int askTileToInsert(ArrayList<model.Tile> tilesInHand) throws IOException

      Method that asks the player the disposition of the tiles.
      If the player chose a wrong parameter a NumberFormatException will be catch. This method also notifies the observers with a Message if everything worked.

      Parameters:
      tilesInHand - an ArrayList of Tiles
      Returns:
      an int that represents the index of a tile from the tilesInHand
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if a IOException gets caught
      IOException

    • askAction

      public int askAction() throws IOException

      Method that shows a list of actions for an active player.
      If the player chose a wrong parameter a NumberFormatException will be catch.

      Returns:
      an int that represents the action that the player, in case of error -1
      Throws:
      IOException

    • showCGC

      public void showCGC(@NotNull @NotNull ArrayList<model.CommonGoalCard> commonGoalCards)

      Method that shows the textual rule for the common goal cards that have been selected.

      Parameters:
      commonGoalCards - an ArrayList of CommonGoalCard that represents the two chosen common goal cards

    • showPGC

      public void showPGC(@NotNull @NotNull model.PersonalGoalCard personalGoalCard)

      Method that prints the personal goal card of a player.

      Parameters:
      personalGoalCard - the PersonalGoalCard associated to a player

    • showPlayers

      public void showPlayers(@NotNull @NotNull ArrayList<model.Player> listOfPlayers)

      Method that prints the lit of players for a match.

      Parameters:
      listOfPlayers - an ArrayList of Players that represents the players in a match

    • askPassiveAction

      public void askPassiveAction()

      Method that shows a list of actions for a passive player.

    • waitInput

      public int waitInput()

      Method that waits for an input by the player.
      If the player chose a wrong parameter a NumberFormatException o a IOException will be catch.

      Returns:
      an int that represents the input from the player, in case of error -1

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver(ArrayList<model.Player> listOfPlayers)

      Method that prints the final rank of a match.

      Parameters:
      listOfPlayers - an ArrayList of Player that represents the final rank of a match
